required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: To Investigate PK and PD of CJ-12420, Clarithromycin, Amoxicillin After Multiple Dose Administration
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label, Randomized Study to Evaluate Pharmacokinetic Interaction, Pharmacodynamics and Safety After Multiple Oral Dosing of CJ-12420 and Amoxicillin/Clarithromycin in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock:
Cohort 1
To evaluate the pharmacokinetic interactions of CJ-12420 after multiple oral doses of CJ-12420 given alone or in combination with amoxicillin/clarithromycin in healthy subjects.
Cohort 2
To evaluate the pharmacodynamic profiles of CJ-12420 after multiple oral doses of CJ-12420 in combination with amoxicillin/clarithromycin in healthy subjects as compared to an active control group, i.e., pantoprazole in combination with amoxicillin/clarithromycin.

detailed_description.textblock: To evaluate the pharmacokinetic the drug-drug interaction of CJ-12420 and amoxicillin/clarithromycin and investigate the pharmacodynamic of co-administration of CJ-12420 and amoxicillin and clarithromycin.

primary_outcome.measure: Peak Plasma Concentration (Cmax) of CJ-12420, clarithromycin and amoxicillin

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC) of CJ-12420, clarithromycin and amoxicillin
Time of maximum observed concentraion(tmax) of CJ-12420, clarithromycin and amoxicillin
Half life(t1/2) of CJ-12420, clarithromycin and amoxicillin
Oral clearance at steady state(CLss/F) of CJ-12420, clarithromycin and amoxicillin
Apparent volume of distribution at steady state(Vdss/F) of CJ-12420, clarithromycin and amoxicillin

secondary_outcome.description: Data from the pH probe monitoring

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day -1, Day 1, Day 7 up to 24 hours
secondary_outcome.description: the percent of time the pH as data from the pH probe monitoring

coadministration of Pantoprazole 40mg and CLR 500mg/AMX 1g BID for 7 days
coadministration of CJ-12420 100mg, CLR 500mg/AMX 1g BID for 7 days
